General.Name: ExtraCredit
General.Description: Extra Credit is a platform where students can get knowledge on Bitcoin and other blockchain technologies. The platform incentivizes learning by offering students XTRA tokens, an Ethereum-based token.

ICO.Description:
Extra Credit is a platform where students can get knowledge on Bitcoin and other blockchain technologies. The platform incentivizes learning by offering students XTRA tokens, an Ethereum-based token.

Team:

  • Curtis Smith: Co-Founder / CEO
  • Jennifer W: Social Media Manager
  • Zayaan I: SEO Manager
  • Morris G: Head Of Marketing

The Extra Credit ICO started on the 4th of January and will last until the 4th of February. The ICO token allocation represents 50% of the total token supply and will be available for a base price of 0.10$ each. The ICO funding cap is set at 60M USD and several cryptocurrencies will be accepted, including BTC, BCH, ETH, LTC, XRP, and more.

Token Reserve Split (50%):

  • Bug Bounty & Promotions 0.8%
  • ICO Referral Program 4.2%
  • Extra Credit Team 25%
  • Pre Sale 16.7%
  • Pre Sale Bonus 3.3%

The Extra Credit ICO features a bonus and bounty campaigns.
